snippet: What Albany needs is competition, and now may be the right moment for Gov. Andrew Cuomo to pass a full reform package that could provide it.
abstract: Editorial urges New York Gov Andrew Cuomo to work toward passage of campaign finance reform package that will provide public matching funds for small donations; holds that public financing system will create competition for dominant wealthy donors and special interest groups; says move will help Cuomo make good on promise to clean up campaign finance system.
lead_paragraph: What Albany needs is competition, and now may be the right moment for Gov. Andrew Cuomo to pass a full reform package that could provide it.

headline.main: Little Time Left for Campaign Reforms
headline.print_headline: Little Time Left for Campaign Reforms
